name: Animals Matching Game For Kids
description: Watch the dogs, cats, elephants and other animals move and speak when you find two of a kind! Pop fun rewards when you complete a level! Keep track of all the animals you have found in the trophy room!  This kids matching game helps develop memory skills of children. It contains cute images such as a puppies, farm animals, an elephant, a lion and more. When all the cards are matched, you get to pop fun rewards and the animals you have found are collected in the trophy room!   FEATURES: - 5 different difficulties (6, 8, 12, 16 and 20 cards) - Cute sounds for kids - Colorful HD graphics designed for toddlers - No ads in game  EDUCATIONAL VALUES: Memory games and jigsaw puzzles are fun all ages, and this one is especially great for kids between 3 and 5 years old. Both boys and girls will love this game as it helps them train their concentration while having puzzle fun.  Music: Happy Alley Kevin MacLeod (incompetech) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
